title: Bloomberg-like Terminal
description: A web application replicating key features of a Bloomberg Terminal, including interactive charting, real-time Insider Transactions, Financials as Reported, SEC Filings, Ticker News, and integrated live news feeds for comprehensive financial data analysis.

title: SiHelau - Sustainable Lampung Tourism App
description: Developing a mobile application for sustainable tourism in Lampung, Indonesia, focusing on eco-friendly travel options, local cultural experiences, and community engagement.

title: Ramadhan 2023 Countdown
description: A web project built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript that displays a real-time countdown to the start of Ramadan 2023, featuring a clean and engaging interface.

title: Persona (Personality Analysis)
description: A simple application designed and has a neutral color to reduce user distraction when taking personality tests.

title: LetsOut Travel Booking
description: Slicing design into a responsive travel website from scratch using HTML, Pure CSS, and Vanilla JavaScript.

title: LiburanYuk Travel Website
description: Developing a user-friendly and responsive travel website, focusing on intuitive navigation and seamless booking experiences across various devices.

title: Stopwatch Pomodoro
description: A productivity tool combining a stopwatch with the Pomodoro Technique, designed to help users manage time effectively and improve focus during work sessions.

title: Quote Generator
description: A simple web application that generates inspirational or thought-provoking quotes with a click, offering a clean interface for quick access to motivation.

title: DC Top Up Website
description: Designing and developing a responsive website for topping up digital currency, focusing on secure transactions, clear pricing, and a smooth user flow.

title: Bisabisnisai Website
description: Crafting a modern and informative website for Bisabisnisai, showcasing their AI-driven business solutions and services with a focus on clear communication and user engagement.

title: Persona (Personality Analysis)
description: Create an interconnection and relationships structure between application pages.

title: Faculty Administration Website
description: Developing an administration website, streamlining internal processes for academic and administrative tasks.

title: iReminder App
description: Designing the entities, attributes, and relationships that will be required on a reminder app.

title: Hidayat Travel Bureau
description: Designing the entities, attributes, and relationships that will be required on a travel website database.
